name: Off The Grid (ArBe)
description:
Made in ~9 hours for the LD Discord Jam #2.

The reason I made this in 9 hours was because at first I thought I wouldn't be able to enter due to being busy, and then jumped in extremely late to the party.

Why/What

The gimmick is that the game window is 500 by 500 pixels and moves around with the player, which means you can only see a limited amount of space at a time.

Besides that, the game is basically just a shitty TRON clone.

How to Play Controls:
  • Arrow keys/WASD to turn.
The Objective:

The objective of the game is to get as high of a score as possible by surviving the longest and killing enemies by forcing them to fly into the trail you leave behind.
